biotools.summary: User-friendly Tools for Operating Informatics Applications visualizes and analyzes bioinformatics data in a user-friendly way. Based on an ontology-driven data model, it allows to view and align protein sequences, to render complex molecular structures in 3D, and to find and use resources such as web services and data objects.
